org.judal.serialization

Class BinaryComparable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.serialization.BinaryComparable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<BinaryComparable>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Text

    public abstract class BinaryComparable
extends Object
implements Comparable<BinaryComparable>
    Interface supported by com.knowgate.misc.WritableComparable types supporting ordering/permutation by a representative set of bytes.
